channel.title: Help!
channel.description: hello ive seen some people who can make themselves completley invisble on servers! how do you do this? please help me, i need to try this on other servers . i know its something to do with the client

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @ShadowDD ShadowDD
item.description:
@ShadowDD wrote:

If there staff they probley Pnpc but if there not then there either hidden or there is a cheat client and I do[size=50pt]Not[/size] recommend and will [size=50pt]Not[/size] recommend a link

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

Well u can do ::pnpc # and some of the npc numbers will make u completely invisible

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

From what I’ve heard you need to get a cheat client, although I would refer to the above post, saying that being invisible is pointless and mostly leads to an account ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!

item.description:
@Baby_are_you_down wrote:

Whats the point of being invisible? anyways its against the rules of most servers anyways… some have ::noclip but thats all i can help
